code: softbib(   output = c("softbib.pdf", "softbib.docx", "softbib.bib", "softbib.Rmd"),   output_dir = getwd(),   include = NULL,   exclude = NULL,   style = NULL )

title: Software Bibliographies — softbib
text: output vector file paths NULL. Acceptable file name extensions: .bib, .Rmd, .docx, .pdf. NULL returns vector BibTeX cite keys. output_dir path directory files saved. include NULL character vector. NULL: working directory crawled identify R packages used project, packages included software bibliography. Character vector: names packages include bibliography. exclude character vector package names exclude bibliography. style Path Citation Style Language file (.csl extension) ' Zotero Repository: https://www.zotero.org/styles

title: Software Bibliographies — softbib
text: Writes bibliography file returns character vector citation keys.

title: Software Bibliographies — softbib
code: if (interactive()) {  # Save current path oldpath <- getwd()  # Navigate to a project folder, crawl the working directory to get a list of `R` # packages, and create bibliographies library(softbib) setwd("~/path/to/my/R/project/") softbib()  # Exclude some packages from the bibliography softbib(exclude = c("base", "dplyr"))  # Specify the list of packages to include manually softbib(include = c("countrycode", "modelsummary", "marginaleffects"))  # Download a Citation Style Language file from the Zotero archive and print a # bibliography in the style of the American Political Science Review download.file(   "https://www.zotero.org/styles/american-political-science-review",   destfile = "apsr.csl") softbib(style = "apsr.csl")  # Return to old path setwd(oldpath) } # end if(interactive()){}
